params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.I_p_protocols
params.description: Protocols that apply as filter on mirrored traffic. If no protocols are specified, all traffic that matches the specified CIDR ranges is mirrored. If neither cidrRanges nor IPProtocols is specified, all traffic is mirrored.

params.name: data.cidr_ranges
params.description: IP CIDR ranges that apply as filter on the source (ingress) or destination (egress) IP in the IP header. Only IPv4 is supported. If no ranges are specified, all traffic that matches the specified IPProtocols is mirrored. If neither cidrRanges nor IPProtocols is specified, all traffic is mirrored.

params.name: data.direction
params.description: Direction of traffic to mirror, either INGRESS, EGRESS, or BOTH. The default is BOTH. Check the Direction enum for the list of possible values.
